Package com.artemis.annotations

Annotations used by Artemis, both runtime and during compilation,

See: Description

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Bind
    Associates components to EntityFactories, either by annotating at the class or method level.
    Mapper Deprecated
    See Wire.
    PackedWeaver
    Transforms a Component into a PackedComponent.
    PooledWeaver
    Transforms a Component into a PooledComponent.
    PreserveProcessVisiblity
    When optimizing an EntityProcessingSystem, don't reduce the visibility of EntitySystem.process().
    Profile
    Profile EntitySystems with user-specified profiler class, implementing ArtemisProfiler.
    Sticky
    Stickied methods have their parameter values persisted for the duration of the EntityFactory instance.
    UseSetter
    Invokes setter on component, instead of invoking fields.
    Wire
    Reflexively injects ComponentMapper, EntitySystem, Manager and EntityFactory fields upon calling World.setSystem(com.artemis.EntitySystem) or World.setManager(com.artemis.Manager).

Package com.artemis.annotations Description

Annotations used by Artemis, both runtime and during compilation,

Runtime: Wire and Mapper.

Annotation Processor for EntityFactory: Bind, Sticky, UseSetter.

Bytecode weaving (provided by CLI tool and gradle/maven plugin): PackedWeaver, PooledWeaver, PreserveProcessVisiblity, Profile.
